title: Eid 2026: How employees can turn 4 days of leave into a 9-day holiday
summary_full: UAE residents are gearing up for an extended Eid al Fitr 2026 holiday, potentially enjoying a nine-day break instead of the official four-day public holiday. This allows for significant travel and family time, with many planning regional trips and staycations. Early planning is key to maximising this cherished festive period.
